title: Ticket #7267: Missing mention of DAGMAN SUBSYSTEM
description:
Mention of the DAGMAN Subsystem is missing in the manual, section Administrator's Manual -> Introduction to Configuration -> Pre-Defined Macros -> $(SUBSYSTEM).

See https://htcondor.readthedocs.io/en/v8_9_3/admin-manual/introduction-to-configuration.html#index-31
creator: moate
